Description: Rare Original MIJ Flame Top Jackson Dinky DK2S Sustainiac w Case: These little beasts are incredible, capable of producing great Duncan tone w/ ultimate sustain when desired. It is also getting more difficult to find one :-). Features an Alder body with rosewood fretboard and shark inlays, Duncan sustaniac, STK-1 and JB TB4 pickups and Jackson -rose tremolo. Ours is not mint but is Very Nice with only a couple dings abd back edge chips. I believe it is all original and everything works just as it should !! The neck is sweet, straight and true with great frets and super low play action. Strings in good condition and just installed a new 9Volt battery. Includes an Ibanez hardcase that protects it well and keeps it happy when not shredding :-). As with all our fine instruments, we understand the bond between player and instrument and always offer a 30 day play/return policy with No restocking fee.
